response.original_title: Luther Vandross: Never Too Much Blu-ray Audio
response.overview: Mostly self-composed and self-produced, Luther Vandross' 'Never Too Much' is a classic and much-loved album which reached the Billboard chart Top 20 and launched Vandross’ successful solo career. With both Dolby Atmos and Stereo mixes this blu-ray audio includes a booklet with notes from The Guardian's Alexis Petridis and a bonus track of the original 12" version of the single 'Never Too Much'.  Dolby Atmos • Stereo Mix  Track list  1 Never Too Much 3:50  2 Sugar And Spice (I Found Me A Girl) 4:57  3 Don't You Know That 4:01  4 I've Been Working 6:35  5 She's A Super Lady 5:04  6 You Stopped Loving Me 5:16  7 A House Is Not A Home 7:07  Bonus Track • Stereo Mix  8 Never Too Much (Special Version From The 12″ Single) 5:45  Runtime: 42:35
response.title: Luther Vandross: Never Too Much Blu-ray Audio
